articles.title: Bitcoin divergence suggests rally is impending; spot BTC ETF rejection report refuted - FXStreet
articles.description: Bitcoin price took a hit on Thursday, resulting in the entire crypto market noting a dip.
articles.content:
• Bitcoin price is observing a potential bullish divergence, suggesting the 6% decline of the day could be reversed.
